name: Schola Cantorum
description: This practical course will focus on the study and performance of 17th and 18th century vocal repertoire from an historically aware perspective. Matters of style, ornamentation, word painting and intonation will be applied to a variety of styles, including solo arias, madrigals and motets, both sacred and secular. The class will be conducted in a master class format. Every other week the class will focus on solo repertoire from oratorio and opera. Alternate weeks will be devoted to ensemble repertoire. Four hours minimum.
